extendedInfo.description: Welcome to the wonderful game âOriental cityâ. Become the city mayor! Use your imagination! Create your dream city! Decorate your city with beautiful houses, gorgeous castles, towers, amusement parks and landmarks. The game is very easy to play. Select your items and place or re-arrange them in your desire place by touching and dragging. FEATURES:- Start building your city with green empty field.- Choose from hundreds of varieties of houses, business buildings and castles. - Extend your city area.- Increase or re-arrange your city roads.- Decorate your city with colorful trees, amusement parks, roads and landmark towers.- Make your city more livable by placing bank, hospital, stadium and useful factories.- Collect free "coin" as you continue building your city. Use coins to buy new items.- Use "cash" to buy exclusive items. - Its Free!The game has world ranking. Raise your play time, increase population and levels. Make your city best in the world!Coming Soon!- Free login bonus - Social functionality- Build multiple towns with different themes.

reviews.title: Unuseful
reviews.comment: Very bad. Nothing to do just build some buildings and thats it. Its really boring. The worst app I ever saw. The view isnt perfect too. Gonna uninstall it now.
reviews.author: Mero jamallyrics

reviews.title: Poor !
reviews.comment: all those comments about this game looked great so i installed it . . . . started to play it and it is pants! dont understand anyone who could say \'its the best game EVER!\' when its clearly not   :o(

reviews.title: Looks like fun
reviews.comment: This looks like it would be good....but it has an annoying problem. The touch screen control is inverted - which I could get used to - but the item movement isn\'t inverted...makes it almost impossible to place things where you want them.
